channel.title: Istio on 云原生社区
channel.description: Recent content in Istio on 云原生社区

item.title: How NetEase Qingzhou Enables Microservices Architecture Evolution with Istio
item.description: In a company with diverse internet businesses like NetEase, each business has its own unique choice of microservices tech stack and system architecture based on their business nature and team composition.
